content.rendered:
Directed by Chandoo Mondeti.

Written by Alphonse Puthren.

Cast Naga Chaitanya Akkineni(Vikram Vatsalya). Shruti Haasan(Sithara). Madonna Sebastian(Sindhu). Anupama Parameswaran(Suma (as Anupama Parameshwaran)). Chaitanya Krishna(Siva). Praveen(Vasu). Jeeva(College Principal). Avantika(Young Sindhu (as Avantika Vandanapu)) . Nagarjuna Akkineni(Vikram’s Father). Joy Badlani(Sithara’s father). Brahmaji(College Coach). Harsha Chemudu(Vikram’s friend (as Viva Harsha)). Venkatesh Daggubati(DCP K. Ramachandra, Vikram’s uncle). Karthik Gattamneni(Akhil). Arjun Kalyan(Kiran). Arvind Krishna(Sanjay, Sithara’s husband). Pruthvi(Suma’s father). Thagubothu Ramesh(Rio Solomon). Easwari Rao(Sithara’s Mother). Josh Ravi(Vikram’s friend). Srinivasa Reddy(E. Kanaka Rao / EK). Ramajogayya Sastry(Restaurant Patron).Sathya. Satya(Choreographer). Noel Sean(Arjun). Narra Srinivas(Kantha Rao).Karan Viijay

Language Telugu.

Producers S. Radha Krishna. P.D.V. Prasad. Suryadevara Naga Vamsi.

Production Sithara Entertainments.
